content:
ProjectUsingTaskElement Class

Definition

Represents a UsingTask Element (MSBuild) in an MSBuild project. The UsingTask element is used both for inline tasks and precompiled tasks.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public class ProjectUsingTaskElement : Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer
Inheritance
Object
ProjectElement
ProjectElementContainer
ProjectUsingTaskElement
Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Properties

Architecture

Gets or sets the Architecture attribute of this inline task.

public string Architecture { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the Architecture attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

ArchitectureLocation

Location of the Architecture attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation ArchitectureLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the Architecture attribute location. If there is no such attribute, returns null.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

AssemblyFile

Gets the value of the AssemblyFile attribute, which selects the name of the assembly to load.

public string AssemblyFile { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the AssemblyFile attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

The assembly may have a strong name and may be located in the GAC. Either the AssemblyFile or AssemblyName attribute must be present, but not both.

AssemblyFileLocation

Location of the AssemblyFile attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation AssemblyFileLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the AssemblyFile attribute location. If there is no such attribute, returns null.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

AssemblyName

Gets and sets the value of the AssemblyName attribute.

public string AssemblyName { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the AssemblyName attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

The file path to the assembly, which may be either a full path or a relative path. Relative paths are relative to the directory of the project file containing this UsingTask. Either the AssemblyFile or AssemblyName attribute must be present, but not both.

AssemblyNameLocation

Location of the AssemblyName attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation AssemblyNameLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the AssemblyName attribute location. If there is no such attribute, returns null.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

ParameterGroup

Gets any ParameterGroup element for this inline task.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.UsingTaskParameterGroupElement ParameterGroup { get; }
Value
UsingTaskParameterGroupElement

Returns the parameter group. Returns null if no parameter group exists.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Runtime

Gets or sets the Runtime attribute of this inline task.

public string Runtime { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the Runtime attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

RuntimeLocation

Location of the Runtime attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation RuntimeLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the Runtime attribute location. If there is no such attribute, returns null.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

TaskBody

Gets the inner XML content of this inline task.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectUsingTaskBodyElement TaskBody { get; }
Value
ProjectUsingTaskBodyElement

Returns the inner XML content of the inline task. Returns null if no body exists.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

The inner XML content is the source code body of the inline task, and is passed directly to the task factory as a string.

TaskFactory

Gets and sets the value of the TaskFactory attribute of this inline task.

public string TaskFactory { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the TaskFactory attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

Selects the task factory class name used to create instances of this task. TaskFactory is used together with either the AssemblyName or AssemblyFile attribute to locate the task factory.

TaskFactoryLocation

Location of the TaskFactory attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation TaskFactoryLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the value of the TaskFactory attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

TaskName

Gets and sets the value of the TaskName attribute.

public string TaskName { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the value of the TaskName attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Remarks

Indicates the name of this precompiled or inline task.

TaskNameLocation

Location of the TaskName attribute on this element, if any.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation TaskNameLocation { get; }
Value
ElementLocation

Returns the value of the TaskName attribute. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

Methods

AddParameterGroup()

Adds a new ParameterGroup element to this inline task.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.UsingTaskParameterGroupElement AddParameterGroup ();
Returns
UsingTaskParameterGroupElement

Returns the new parameter group.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute

AddUsingTaskBody(String, String)

Adds a new TaskBody element to this inline task.

public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectUsingTaskBodyElement AddUsingTaskBody (string evaluate, string taskBody);
Parameters
evaluate
String

A flag which, if true, expands the item and property values in the task body. This flag is true by default.

taskBody
String

The body of the task as a string.

Returns
ProjectUsingTaskBodyElement

Returns the new task body.

Attributes
DebuggerDisplayAttribute
